content: i had a number of requests to write my double_crochet hat pattern for use with a 6 00 mm hook - here it is a simple and easy-to-follow double_crochet beanie pattern made with worsted weight yarn and a 6 00 mm j crochet hook this free pattern includes sizes from baby to adult large and uses only basic stitches making it a fast and practical project for gift-giving or everyday wear a great pattern for crocheters looking for a classic and customizable beanie ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
